body_html:
Actually cuda files shouldn't include any eigen headers, we should fix the bad includes instead

Update:
Seems like the use of eigen in math_gpu.cu is intentional. Let's see whether we can make it work.

body:
Actually cuda files shouldn't include any eigen headers, we should fix the bad includes instead

Update:
Seems like the use of eigen in math_gpu.cu is intentional. Let's see whether we can make it work.
